name: Skibidi Toilets: Invasion
description:
Welcome to Skibidi Invasion, a heart-pounding FPS zombie shooter where you must obliterate cyborg toilets and restore order to a world in chaos! Armed with an array of weapons, unleash your fury against the rebellious toilets across seven distinct locations, each offering its own challenges and opportunities for strategic mayhem.

PLAY ON 5 UNIQUE MAPS

From dilapidated city streets and eerie graveyards to abandoned factories and secret underground bunkers, prepare to battle the cyborg toilet menace in diverse environments teeming with danger.

COLLECT ALL WEAPONS

Choose from a vast arsenal of weapons, from traditional firearms to experimental gadgets, each with its own modifications and upgrades.

IMPROVE YOUR CHARACTER

But victory won't come easy - pump up your main character with enhancements to accelerate movement, increase damage output, and unlock special abilities. Strategize wisely, hone your skills, and prepare for the ultimate showdown against the Skibidi rebellion.
